abstract: Editorial supports Army Capt Nathan Michael Smith's lawsuit challenging Pres Obama's legal authority to conduct military campaign against Islamic State group and calls on federal court to allow suit to move forward; warns that Obama administration and Congress are setting dangerous precedent by ignoring need for congressional war authorization.

headline.print_headline: A Soldier’s Challenge to the President
headline.main: A Soldier’s Challenge to the President

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations

snippet: A lawsuit could force the Obama administration and Congress to formally authorize the military campaign against the Islamic State.
lead_paragraph: A lawsuit could force the Obama administration and Congress to formally authorize the military campaign against the Islamic State.
